topicTitle: Re: Brando8850's app for a promotion admin

posts.postText:
I wouldn't normaly do this but Ben told me to apply on the forum so...
1) FULL NAME: Brandon Johnson
2) In-Game name: [NNJG]Brando8850
3) Steam ID:STEAM_0:0:30907466
4) Email: REDACTED@REDACTED
5) How long have you been involved(frequent player, moderator, donor, admin) with [NNJG] or Shadow's TTT/Flood/Jail/ect. server. I've been playing on the servers daily since Gash invited me to the steam group in April.
6) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.)Server moderation.
7) Why you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team. I thought I already was.
8 ) Any other GMOD experience: Being global moderator for nnjg for over 2 months.
9) Have you ever owned a GMOD server? Nope, but I know the admin commands.
10) Any other Comments. Ben told me I only needed to get 5 recommendations but i decided to get 10.
 http://i28.tinypic.com/21ainp1.png
As i said in my recommendation, i think you should get a week of trial like No Refunds did, but i'll just let the owners decide :3
We, or I, am not looking for any more admins.
